sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè fú huà de sècǎi hěn fēngfù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les couleurs de ce tableau sont très riches.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The colors in this painting are very rich.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngsī de dàiyù hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette entreprise offre un bon salaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This company offers good benefits.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他的眼睛是遗传他妈妈的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de yǎnjing shì yíchuán tā māma de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses yeux sont hérités de sa mère.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His eyes are inherited from his mother.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nàge xiǎohuǒzi hěn yǒu lǐmào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce jeune homme est très poli.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That young man is very polite.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要测试一下这个软件。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào cèshì yīxià zhège ruǎnjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons tester ce logiciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to test this software.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这条街有很多特色小吃。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo jiē yǒu hěn duō tèsè xiǎochī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette rue a beaucoup de snacks locaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This street has many local snacks.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们来对比一下这两个方案。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen lái duìbǐ yīxià zhè liǎng gè fāng'àn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Comparons ces deux plans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's compare these two plans.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Ānquán shì zuì zhòngyào de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La sécurité est la plus importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Safety is the most important.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jiǎnchá shǒujī de shèzhì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez vérifier les paramètres du téléphone.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please check the phone settings.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì wǒ de hǎoyǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est mon bon ami.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is my good friend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè chǎng bǐsài fēicháng jīliè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette compétition est très intense.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This match is very intense.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de yǎnjiǎng hěn jīngcǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son discours était excellent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His speech was excellent.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个项目需要三个月完成。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiàngmù xūyào sān gè yuè wánchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce projet nécessite trois mois pour être terminé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This project needs three months to complete.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng děng yīxià, wǒ mǎshàng lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Attendez un moment, j'arrive tout de suite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please wait a moment, I'll be right there.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我已经预订了酒店房间。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǐjīng yùdìng le jiǔdiàn fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai déjà réservé une chambre d'hôtel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have already booked a hotel room.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bù zàihu biérén de kànfǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il ne se soucie pas de l'opinion des autres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He doesn't care about others' opinions.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 三分之一的人同意这个提议。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Sān fēn zhī yī de rén tóngyì zhège tíyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Un tiers des gens sont d'accord avec cette proposition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: One-third of the people agree with this proposal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tào fángzi zhèngzài chūshòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet appartement est en vente.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This apartment is for sale.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiǎoxīn huǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Faites attention au feu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Be careful with fire.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zuò zài hòutou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est assis à l'arrière.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is sitting in the back.
